snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Shadow | Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Gotham City is in danger. And you’re the only one who can save it. Batman: Arkham Shadow, coming late 2024. Only on Meta Quest 3. 

Follow @MetaQuestVR on social for news and updates:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/metaquest 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MetaQuestVR  
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@metaquest
X: https://twitter.com/MetaQuestVR

ESRB: Rating Pending
